dataset.select: select id, status_id, status_name, user_created, employee_name, doc_date, doc_number, organization_name from consumption_view where doc_date between :from_date and :to_date and organization_id = :organization_id
dataset.select-id: select id, status_id, status_name, user_created, employee_name, doc_date, doc_number, organization_name from consumption_view where i.id = :id

dataset.select: select id, '№' || view_number || ' от ' || to_char(doc_date, 'DD.MM.YYYY') as name, doc_date, doc_number, organization_id, employee_id from consumption where id = :id
dataset.update: update consumption set doc_date = :doc_date, doc_number = :doc_number, employee_id = :employee_id, organization_id = :organization_id where id = :id

controls.dataset: select id, name from organization where status_id = 1002

select e.id, e.status_id, p.name from consumption i join organization org on (org.id = i.organization_id) join employee e on (e.owner_id = org.id) join person p on (p.id = e.person_id) where i.id = :id and (e.status_id = 1002 or e.id = :employee_id)

controls.name: datagrid
controls.dataset: select c.id, c.owner_id, g.name as goods_name, c.amount, p.name as product_name from consumption_detail c left join goods g on (g.id = c.goods_id) left join goods p on (p.id = c.product_id) where c.owner_id = :id

dataset.name: consumption_detail
dataset.select: select id, owner_id, goods_id, amount, product_id from consumption_detail where id = :id
dataset.insert: insert into consumption_detail (owner_id, goods_id, amount, product_id) values (:owner_id, :goods_id, :amount, :product_id) returning id
dataset.update: update consumption_detail set goods_id = :goods_id, amount = :amount, product_id = :product_id where id = :id

controls.dataset: with recursive r as (select id, status_id, name, parent_id from goods where code = 'Мат' union all select g.id, g.status_id, g.name, g.parent_id from goods g join r on (g.parent_id = r.id)) select id, status_id, name, parent_id from r where status_id in (500, 1002) or id = :goods_id order by name

with recursive r as (select id, status_id, name, parent_id from goods where code = 'Прд' union all select g.id, g.status_id, g.name, g.parent_id from goods g join r on (g.parent_id = r.id)) select id, status_id, name, parent_id from r where status_id in (500, 1002) or id = :goods_id order by name
